Plot: Florentino, rejected by the beautiful Fermina at a young age, devotes much of his adult life to carnal affairs as a desperate attempt to heal his broken heart.
Title: Love in the Time of Cholera
Actors: Benjamin Bratt, Gina Bernard Forbes, Giovanna Mezzogiorno, Javier Bardem
tomatoConsensus: Though beautifully filmed, the makers of Love in the Time of Cholera fail to transfer the novel's magic to the screen.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 3 nominations.
